name: Endomondo-Summary
author: TLuxton

sections.description:
Allows you to embed the Endomodo Summary widget anywhere on your wordpress site using a shortcode.

This is an active beta project, please report any bugs so I can fix them.

Known Issues

Title: Combination of CSS Location set to External and Method set to Local causes CSS issues on main page.
Status: Wont fix
Notes:

Title: Links do not open in external window
Status: Investigating
Notes: Temporary Workaround, you can use external links plugin: https://wordpress.org/extend/plugins/sem-external-links/

In Development

  • Allowing users to opt in to beta testing by advertising the web address and error_log for endomondo-summary plugin
sections.installation:
1. Extract and Upload endomondo-summary to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  3. Fill in the variables on the Endomondo-Summary page, located in the Settings section on the admin menu
  4. Place [endomondo-summary] in your post/page
sections.faq:
Where is the FAQ

It is coming soon!
